website_summaries.verdict: This sander gets high marks for its ease of use and the overall excellent way that it operates.
pros: Dust collection feature and smooth running get a lot of praise
Includes six sanding sleeves with matching rubber drums and table inserts

customer_reviews.title: ... the inside curves on wooden toy parts and works fine. I rated it 4 for a couple reasons
customer_reviews.text: I use it for sanding the inside curves on wooden toy parts and works fine. I rated it 4 for a couple reasons. The inserts do not come all the way to the top of the table. This leaves a sight lip that catches smaller parts or when starting at the end of a larger part. The inserts also just set in the table and are not secured. Additionally, the largest of the washers provided for the larger spindles and sleeves does not fit the arbor. Washer are easy to find locally, but one would expect the tool to come with the correct parts. On the plus side, the spindles/sleeves are easy to change.
customer_reviews.author: Home Remodeler

product_meta.title: Triton TSPS450 3.5Amp Cast Iron Top Oscillating Spindle Sander, Orange
product_meta.description:
Delivers a professional finish to every project. Outstanding performance can be expected from the Triton TSPS450 Oscillating Spindle Sander. The oscillating action in combination with the rotating drum reduces the chance for burning and eliminates band marks on both internal and external profiles. With 6 different sleeve sizes included, the TSPS450 provides woodworkers the flexibility to select the optimum sleeve size for the precise needs of every project. Stability and enhanced material support is provided by the large 11 ½” x 14 ½” cast iron table. This sander is that special woodworking machine that helps every project look even better when finished.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Established in 1976, Triton Precision Power Tools designs and manufactures a wide range of power tools primarily aimed at the expert woodworker. From award-winning, innovative routers, sanding products and circular saws, to the ground-breaking SuperJaws and the original Triton Workcenter, Triton has a history of innovative design, which is responsive to the needs of woodworking professionals and enthusiasts alike.

SET CONTAINS:
6 Sanding sleeves - 13, 19, 26, 38, 51, 76 mm
6 Table inserts - 13, 19, 26, 38, 51, 76 mm
5 Rubber sanding drums - 19, 26, 38, 51, 76 mm
3 Upper spindle washers - 15, 21, 46 mm
135mm wrench
Instruction manual
